mapper.select: select customerno "customerno", employeename "employeename", loginname "loginname", branchid "branchid", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", email "email", status "status", province "province", city "city", county "county", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.employee where customerno = #{customerno} for update

select customerno "customerno", employeename "employeename", loginname "loginname", branchid "branchid", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", email "email", status "status", province "province", city "city", county "county", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.employee where customerno = #{customerno}

select customerno "customerno", employeename "employeename", loginname "loginname", branchid "branchid", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", email "email", status "status", province "province", city "city", county "county", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.employee where customerno = #{customerno}
mapper.insert: insert into cas.employee( customerno,employeename,loginname,branchid,certificatetype, certificateno,mobile,email,status,province, city,county,insertdate,inserttime,updatedate, updatetime ) values( #{customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{employeename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{loginname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{branchid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{county, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cas.employee( customerno,employeename,loginname,branchid,certificatetype, certificateno,mobile,email,status,province, city,county,insertdate,inserttime,updatedate, updatetime ) values
( #{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.employeename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.loginname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.branchid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.county, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
